wikipedia_page.main: Grant Weatherstone (27 June 1931 – 2 January 2020) was a Scotland international rugby union player. Weatherstone played as a winger.

response: *Grant Weatherstone (1931–2020) - international rugby player who was played 16 times for Scotland.
